channel.title: Exams on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Exams
item.description: See the Final Review (PDF) notes to prepare for the final exam. item.title: final_rev_hndout.pdf
item.description: Two-part Tariffs, Bundling, Pricing, Transfer Pricing, Asymmetric Information, Cartels and Auctions, Externalities/Common Property and Game theory.

item.title: midterm_review.pdf
item.description: Market Definition, Supply/Demand, Elasticities, Government Policies, Production/Cost/Network Externalities, Learning Curve, Dynamic Demand, Time and Uncertainty, Monopolies, Market Power.
